0% 0,0% 100%,color-stop(0%,#7fb6e7),color-stop(2%,#2986d6),color-stop(100%,#1d5e96));color:#fff;border-color:#103656;text-shadow:0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5)}.touchgridpanel .x-grid-sort-asc{background:url("data:image/gif;base64,") no-repeat right center}.touchgridpanel .x-grid-sort-desc{background:url("data:image/gif;base64,") no-repeat right center}.touchgridpanel .x-grid-header{padding:0}
